    • Method Detail

      • parseHtml

        public static jodd.jerry.Jerry parseHtml(String html,
                                         int baseLineNumber)
        Parse the given html.

        Position information are kept.

        Parameters:
        html - HTML to parse
        baseLineNumber - Offset the parsed nodes line by this number, starting a 0. When appending a new node, it is important to maintain the new node's line number for better debugging experience
        Returns:
        Jerry
